channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 08:45 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region. Stop by further messages.
item.description: 游릭 08:45 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region. Stop by further messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 08:42 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Further in further messages.
item.description: 游릭 08:42 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Further in further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 08:36 Threat of Artbill! Now in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community artillery shelling. Walk into shelter!
item.description: 游댮 08:36 Threat of Artbill! Now in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community artillery shelling. Walk into shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 游리 08:25 The threat of shelling in Marganets and Manganese territorial community. Find out, the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#M_MAMARANETS_TA_AMA_AMACA_AMARGANETSKA This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
